# Issue #031: Advanced Table Features (Pagination, Sorting, Filtering)

**Phase:** Phase 3 - Data & Realtime  
**Weeks:** 17-18  
**Component:** Frontend  
**Estimated Effort:** 6 days  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Labels:** phase-3, frontend, table, data-display

## Description
Enhance the Table widget with advanced features including server-side pagination, sorting, filtering, column configuration, row actions, bulk operations, and data export.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Server-side pagination with page size options
- [ ] Column sorting (client and server-side)
- [ ] Column filtering (multiple types)
- [ ] Column show/hide configuration
- [ ] Column reordering
- [ ] Row selection (single and multi)
- [ ] Row actions menu
- [ ] Bulk actions on selected rows
- [ ] Data export (CSV, Excel)
- [ ] Virtualized scrolling for large datasets
- [ ] Column resizing
- [ ] Column pinning (freeze columns)

## Dependencies
- Depends on: #018 (Basic table widget)
- Depends on: #023 (Datasource system)

## Deliverables
- Enhanced table widget
- Filter components
- Tests
- Documentation
